legal.api.content:
Example: Retrieve a specific ticket

Make a GET request to /api/v1/tickets/{ticketId}.

Successful response (200 OK)

{
  "id": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
  "title": "Printer issue",
  "status": "Open",
  ...
}

Common Errors

  • 401 Unauthorized: Your API key is missing, invalid, or expired.
  • 404 Not Found: The ticket with the specified ID does not exist.
  • 429 Too Many Requests: You have exceeded the allowed request limit.

legal.integration.content:
Overview

This guide provides a basic overview of how to integrate with Nexus Support Hub. Integration is mainly via our RESTful API, allowing you to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) support tickets.

Authentication

Each API request must be authenticated using an API key you can generate from your Manager dashboard. The key must be included in the request header as follows:

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY

Create a ticket

To create a new ticket, make a POST request to the /api/v1/tickets endpoint with a JSON body containing the ticket details.

{
  "title": "Printer issue",
  "description": "The printer on the 3rd floor is not responding.",
  "priority": "High",
  "user_email": "user@example.com"
}
legal.integration.title: Simple Integration Guide

legal.pricing.content:
Pricing Plans

We offer several service levels to meet your needs. Please see our official pricing page for the latest details (link coming soon).

  • Basic: Ideal for small teams.
  • Professional: For growing businesses with greater needs.
  • Enterprise: Custom solutions with dedicated support.

Billing

Billing is monthly or yearly, depending on the chosen plan. Payments are securely processed via our payment partner. You can manage your billing info and view invoices from your Manager dashboard.
legal.pricing.title: Pricing & Billing
legal.privacy.content:
1. Data Collection

We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and support ticket content. This data is necessary to provide and improve the service.

2. Data Use

Your data is used exclusively for support ticket management, improving our AI assistant, and communicating with you. We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes.

3. Your Rights

In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and port your data. You can exercise these rights by contacting our support at the address in the Intellectual Property section.
legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy (GDPR Compliant)
legal.security.content:
Request Limits (Rate Limiting)

To ensure service stability for all clients, API requests are limited to 100 requests per minute per API key. If you exceed this limit, you will receive a 429 status code response.

Data Security

All data between your client and our servers is encrypted using TLS 1.2 or higher. Passwords are hashed and salted, and sensitive data at rest is encrypted. We regularly conduct security audits to ensure your information is protected.
legal.security.title: Limits & Security Information
legal.sla.content:
Service Level Agreement (SLA)

We commit to 99.9% service availability for our Professional and Enterprise plans. Availability is calculated monthly, excluding planned maintenance. If this commitment is not met, service credits may be applied.

Technical Support

Support is available via the application's ticket system. Response times vary by plan:

  • Basic: Response within 24 business hours.
  • Professional: Response within 8 business hours.
  • Enterprise: Response within 4 hours, 24/7 for critical issues.
legal.sla.title: SLA & Support

advantagesContent:
• Instant Resolution: The AI handles requests in real-time, drastically reducing response times and boosting customer satisfaction.
  • Enterprise-Grade Security: Protect your data with an isolated architecture, strictly controlled access, and GDPR compliance.
  • Advanced Analytics: Track your support performance with detailed dashboards and key metrics for informed decision-making.
advantagesTitle: The Advantages That Set You Apart
appDescription: Un centre d'assistance intelligent dotÃ© de notre assistant virtuel Â« Nexus Â». Obtenez une aide instantanÃ©e, gÃ©rez efficacement les tickets avec des tableaux de bord adaptÃ©s Ã  chaque rÃ´le, et profitez des fonctionnalitÃ©s vocales pour une expÃ©rience plus fluide.
conclusionContent: Nexus Support Hub is not just a tool; it's your strategic partner for revolutionizing customer support. By adopting our platform, you invest in efficiency, security, and customer satisfaction, positioning your business for sustainable growth. Join the intelligent customer support revolution today.
featuresContent:
• Instant AI Assistance: Our AI, Nexus, provides 24/7 support, capable of categorizing, summarizing, and responding to common queries. It automatically creates clear tickets for human agents when needed.
  • Secure & Multi-Tenant: Each company has a completely isolated data environment, ensuring confidentiality and security. Our role-based access control ensures that data is seen only by authorized personnel.
  • Voice Enabled: Enhance accessibility with voice commands for chat and automatic text-to-speech for AI responses, making support more inclusive.
featuresTitle: Key Features of Nexus Support Hub
futureContent:
• Advanced Integrations: We plan to integrate with popular CRM and messaging platforms for a smoother workflow.
  • AI Customization: Future developments will allow businesses to train the AI with their own knowledge bases for even more accurate and specific responses.
  • Appointment Module: An integrated system for scheduling appointments with agents will be added for more efficient management of complex interactions.
introContent: In a world where customers demand fast and personalized responses, Nexus Support Hub stands as an innovative solution. Our platform combines a powerful ticketing system with an advanced automation and conversation engine to transform customer support management. It automates repetitive tasks, enhances productivity, and guarantees high customer satisfaction, while offering professional-grade security and a multi-tenant architecture.
introTitle: Introduction: A Revolution in Intelligent Customer Support
limitsContent: While powerful, the current system is optimized for small to medium-sized businesses. Advanced integrations with third-party CRMs or ERP systems are not yet available in the standard plans. AI customization beyond basic categorization capabilities requires a custom offer.

docs.investorDeck.subtitle: Nexus Support Hub overview: autonomous L1â†’L2 AI help desk, multilingual (FR/EN/AR), multi-tenant on Supabase (PostgreSQL + RLS), RGAA 4.1-inspired accessibility, Beta / Early Access with pilot customers.
docs.investorDeck.summary.title: Product summary
docs.investorDeck.summary.point1: L1 automation and L2 structuring: AI answers, summaries, categories, and priorities to accelerate teams.
docs.investorDeck.summary.point2: Multilingual interface (FR/EN/AR) with built-in accessibility for every audience.
docs.investorDeck.summary.point3: Multi-tenant architecture on Supabase (PostgreSQL, RLS, Edge Functions).
docs.investorDeck.summary.point4: Accessibility inspired by RGAA 4.1: keyboard navigation, visible focus, ARIA, contrast, voice assistance.
docs.investorDeck.summary.point5: Beta / Early Access product with a functional MVP and first pilot programs.
docs.investorDeck.problems.title: Problems addressed
docs.investorDeck.problems.point1: High L1 ticket volume without structure or prioritization.
docs.investorDeck.problems.point2: Multilingual and accessibility requirements (RGAA) for users and employees.
docs.investorDeck.problems.point3: Weak continuity between L1 and L2 for business and IT teams.
docs.investorDeck.value.title: Value proposition
docs.investorDeck.value.point1: Assisted automation: AI manages L1 and prepares L2 escalations with reliable summaries.
docs.investorDeck.value.point2: Managerial control: user/agent/manager roles, RLS isolation, and cross-team views.
docs.investorDeck.value.point3: Company-specific FAQs to handle business and IT questions.
docs.investorDeck.vision.title: Product vision and high-level roadmap

docs.technicalOverview.title: Technical overview / Architecture
docs.technicalOverview.subtitle: Snapshot of the Nexus Support Hub stack.
docs.technicalOverview.architecture.poin: Frontend with React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind for a fast, accessible experience.
Supabase backend with PostgreSQL, RLS policies, and Edge Functions for serverless workloads.
Gemini-based AI engine for generation, summarization, and ticket categorization.
docs.technicalOverview.security.title: Security and compliance
docs.technicalOverview.security.point1: Multi-tenant separation via RLS, role management (user, agent, manager), and fine permissions.
docs.technicalOverview.security.point2: Strict CSP, GDPR-friendly practices, and Supabase hosting for data governance.
docs.technicalOverview.security.point3: Planned logging and access controls to trace critical actions.
docs.technicalOverview.accessibility.poi: Aligned with RGAA 4.1 principles: keyboard navigation, visible focus, consistent ARIA.

presentation.title: Discover Nexus Support Hub
presentation.description: Nexus Support Hub is an intelligent help desk that combines AI, ticket management, and a multi-company architecture. The goal: reduce support workload, structure requests, and offer accessible support for everyone.

forWho.title: Who is Nexus for?
forWho.intro: Nexus is designed for organizations that receive many recurring requests:
items: SMBs / mid-market companies with IT or customer support teams,
Organizations needing FR / EN / AR support without multiplying teams.

problems.title: Problems addressed today:
items: Too many repetitive L1 tickets (access, passwords, simple procedures),
Agents overwhelmed by emails, little ticket structuring,
Need for an accessible tool (keyboard, screen readers, contrast) without building in-house.

impact.title: Expected impact
impact.description: Nexus is built to reduce time spent on simple level 1 requests, increase tickets handled per agent, improve answer quality and consistency, and deliver a better user experience. Pilot deployments will measure these gains precisely and refine the product with our customers.
